name: Personal Porfolio
description: A personal website is designed to optimize UI/UX and compatible with any device. This project use Vite with TailwindCSS to demonstrate the static frontend building skill.
alt: This project is a personal website which designed to optimize UI/UX and compatible with any device. This project use Vite with TailwindCSS to demonstrate the static frontend building skill

name: Web Development Playground
description: A comprehensive repository of self-learning and practice in various web technologies, from basic (HTML/CSS/JS) to modern frameworks (React, Tailwind, ExpressJS). It's a place to experiment with programming techniques from frontend to backend.
alt: This is a comprehensive repository of self-learning and practice in various web technologies, from basic (HTML/CSS/JS) to modern frameworks (React, Tailwind, ExpressJS). It's a place to experiment with programming techniques from frontend to backend.

name: Honkai Station
description: A Wiki application to search information about game Honkai Impact 3. This project have role-based access control which allows ADMIN to manage application data by supabase (CRUD) and USER to look up information visually.
alt: This project is a Wiki application to search information about game Honkai Impact 3. This project have role-based access control which allows ADMIN to manage application data by supabase (CRUD) and USER to look up information visually
